name: Jelly Climber
description:
"Jelly Climber" is a fun platformer game where you control a slime that must climb a dangerous tower full of spiked traps, while sticking to walls and bouncing on trampolines to avoid falling into the void. As you progress, you must light bonfires as checkpoints to be able to return to them if you die. Get ready for an exciting challenge as you fight to reach the top of the tower!

Controls: Use the mouse to click on the slime and drag it in the opposite direction to where you want to jump.

Objetive: Keep going up until climb the tower.

Usefull: Activate the bonfires, they are checkpoints.

Art by: FrankDps

Coding: Dekotale

Sounds: https://opengameart.org and pixabay
